data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during HECTOR cruise from St. Helena to Blackwall started at 1754-01-16
Ship: Hector, Voyage: St Helena - Blackwall Uk, 1st Observer: Stephen Kirwan (Captain), Company: EIC, Other ship information: 26G 499BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
